attributes.additional_details: I think school punishments should get banned because it is bad for the children’s mental health. Them being in trouble for little things like forgetting a piece of uniform of being late to school should not be punished. Punishments should only occur if something bad happens like fights ect. I think it is really unfair if you get a detention for being 1 minute late or if you forget a piece of uniform. These Children deserve better.
attributes.background: I want the government to make sure punishment if for serious occurrences.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prevent schools isolating or excluding students to enforce school uniform policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643501

Create a statutory behaviour and discipline policy that applies to all schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636908
